scripts.heroku-postbuild: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then pnpm prod-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then pnpm prod-backend; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-backend; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
